channel.title: Abouts on Josh Ayres
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Josh Ayres

item.title: Josh Ayres
item.description: Hi, I’m Josh, a software engineer. I specialize in Backend development using NodeJS or Golang. I also do some frontend work with ReactJS when working on full stack projects. You can check out some of these projects here. I have a deep understanding of low level programming from years of hobby game development using C and OpenGL. I love to learn new technologies, and I am always looking for the next biggest thing in tech.
